title: Champion organizing system
body: I was wondering if a system which lets you create categories that you could place champions under could be viable, With large champ pools and 5 different roles of Top, Mid, Support, ADC and Jungle it can sometimes be hard a rush when your deciding on what would be a good pick this match and I think being able to create your own list of categories of supports or top lane that you have made based on personal preference could be handy. I know you can search for a champion but having different categories that each player uniquely made would allow for more decisive picks as you'd know where to look if you were supporting this match you'd have all your supports listed under the category already so you could quickly see what you could use for that match.
